data.text: Azafe ná-guyei.
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, nɔ̀un nà, ná tago nɔ kɔ̀ɠɔiti ti ɠɛnina ɓunɛsu,
mazɔlɔɔ gè ɠɛni toloi ɠulazu ga waso nui,
Mazɔlɔɔ kpɔlɔ la zeelizu ti ma, eyɛsu ti zaa voloi zeeli,
Kpɔlɔi nii é zeizu nuɓusɛiti ma, naa tanɔpɛ ge la zeizu ti ma,
Naa ɠa é ba, ta ɓɔɠɔ maaɠilizu ga wasogi, é ɠɛ ti ɠɔbu ga yɔlɔɠɔi,
Ti-ɠaazuʋɛ ɠa volozu ga ti-ma wulɔi,
Ta ɲɛɛɠulasui ɠɛɛzu, ti ɗa ɓɔɛ ga ɲɔuɗa,
Ta laalosu geeɠɔlɔgi ɓɔɠɔi ʋa,
Naa ɠa é ba, nuɓusɛiti ta ʋilɛsu ti ʋolu,
ti ɗa ɠɛ ma: «Leeni ɠa GALA ge kwɛɛ?
Ʋele ɠana faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ti la,
Deɠɛmu fuun faa ɠa gè kɛɛni ga gè ɓɔɠɔ makɛ ladalai zu,
Nà kpɔlɔi zɔlɔɔsu folo-o-folo,
Kɛlɛ ni gè deveni ga gè ɓɔɛ ga ti ɠɛʋele,
Gè tɔɔzeini ga ɠigaiziɛ, gè ɠidaani bu, ga gè gaaɠa,
Eyɛsu naama voloi, yeei gè lɛɛni la GALA seizu ɲadegai,
Gaamazu, ɗa ti ʋilɛsu pele zuɲagiti su,
Ee, wɛlɛ, yeeɠɛɠala go nɔ laawu, é ɠɛa ga nimizai, ti loa ya,
Eɠɛʋelei maaniinigiti ti la, niiti ti ɠaazu segi zu, ɗa wuunna ti ɲɛɛlɛ,
Siɛgi zu zìiɠaawanani la gola,
gè ɠɛni ga ɠimalala nui,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, nà è ʋa yeenɔpɛ,
Ɗa losu tùɠɔ è-yiimai zu,
Ɓɛ ɠili ka é zèema geeɠɔlɔgi zu?
Anɛɛ ni kpùsɛi ɠa ɓɔlɔ, zìi ɓalaa,
Mazɔlɔɔ wɛlɛ, niiti ti maaɠoozazu è ʋa, ti undaa ɠa ʋilisu.
Nɔ̀un nà, nà-undaanɛɛi ɠa é ga gè ɠɛ GALA kobaʋɛ yeenɔpɛ.
